channel.title: Pages on Sajib Devnath
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Sajib Devnath

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, My name is Sajib Devnath Akash. I like to work with data, specially finding new information from data. I am very interested in data visualization. I am currently learning ggplot2.

item.title: Contact
item.description: body {font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;} * {box-sizing: border-box;} input[type=text], input[type=email], select, textarea { width: 80%; padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 4px; box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 16px; resize: vertical; align:left; } input[type=submit] { background-color: #34495E; color: white; padding: 12px 20px; border: none; cursor: pointer; align:left; } input[type=submit]:hover { background-color: #4C7393; } .new-form { border-radius: 5px; background-color: #ffffff; padding: 20px; } Name Email Message

item.title: Thank You
item.description: I’ll get back to you as soon as I can. ← Back to Homepage
